title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, December 11, 2021
description: “The best training is to read and write, no matter what…Write what will stop your breath if you don’t write.” -- Grace Paley (born 1922).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “The best training is to read and write, no matter what…Write what will stop your breath if you don’t write.” -- Grace Paley (born 1922).
